Expected Result: The system should allow successful registration with valid inputs (name email password phone address).
The system should allow successful owner registration with ID document upload and store details.
The system should not allow duplicate account registration and display error message.
Users should be redirected to the appropriate dashboard based on their role.
The system should display an error and deny access.
User receives verification email and can verify account via link before login.
New profile data (name phone address photo) should be saved and reflected immediately.
Password should be changed successfully with old password verification.
User is logged out and redirected to the login screen.
Owner can add bike with details (brand model price photos) and it appears in their listings.
Owner can modify bike details and changes are saved and reflected.
System shows available bikes with search and filter options (location brand price).
Clicking a bike listing opens full description owner info photos and availability calendar.
Booking is created with selected dates and bike reserved in the system with correct schedule.
The system should prevent booking if bike is already reserved for those dates.
User can view complete booking information including dates price and status.
Renter can cancel booking and status updates accordingly.
Owner can approve booking and status changes to approved.
Owner can reject booking with reason and renter is notified.
Owner dashboard shows all active rentals with renter information and time remaining.
Payment is processed securely and booking is confirmed upon successful payment.
Booking is created with cash payment status and requires owner verification.
Owner can verify cash payment and activate booking rental time starts.
User can view all payment transactions with dates and amounts.
User grants location permission and system can track location.
Renter's location is tracked and sent to owner in real-time every 15 seconds.
Owner can see renter's live location on map with bike icon marker and geofence circle.
Owner receives SMS alert when renter leaves geofence boundary.
Owner receives SMS alert when rental time has expired.
Owner can see the path taken by renter on the map with color coding.
User receives notification via SignalR and it appears as popup at top of page.
Badge count updates automatically when new notification is received.
Sound plays when notification is received (if enabled).
Notification is marked as read when clicked or closed and badge count decreases.
Owner receives notification when new cash payment request is created.
Owner can set store location with address coordinates and geofence radius (default 5km).
Owner dashboard shows all pending rental requests with renter details.
Owner can view dedicated map page for tracking specific renter's live location.
Map displays bikes available near renter's current location.
Renter can view their own location on map with store marker and geofence circle.
Renter can view all past and current bookings with status.
User can submit rating (1-5 stars) and review comment after completed rental.
All ratings and reviews are displayed on bike details page.
Admin can login and access admin dashboard with system statistics.
Admin can view list of all users and suspend accounts if needed.
Admin can verify owner ID documents and approve owner status.
Admin can view all bookings in the system with filters.
All user inputs are validated before processing and display appropriate error messages.
Users can only access pages appropriate for their role (Renter Owner Admin).
Passwords are hashed using secure algorithm and not stored in plain text.
